legacies.label: The Librarian
legacies.description: 'She brought them to Brancrug Isle, which even then was a hidden place, to make a double foundation of nuns and monks, and become its first abbess: but she would admit none to the order who was a virgin, nor innocent of any crime. Since then, Brancrug has been a refuge for all the world might consider impure.'
legacies.startdescription: January, 193_. One month after the library fire.
